name: Where in Hyrule are We?  2 Quiz | Zelda Games | 10 Questions

questions.text: Hmmm...  we seem to be in Mido's house.  Where is Mido's house?
questions.explanation:
Kokiri Forest.

	Mido is the leader of the Kokiri people.  He lives in a house near the entrance to the Lost Woods.

questions.text: We've just gotten a pair of gauntlets, and we're set to get a new item in this dungeon as well.  What temple are we in?
questions.explanation:
Spirit Temple & Spirit.

	We get ourselves the silver gauntlets as a child, and the mirror shield as an adult in the Spirit Temple.  It's the only level where you must go back in time while completing it.

questions.text: We've just completed Dampe's quest for the hookshot and left his grave, but where have we just arrived at?
questions.explanation:
In the Windmill.

	Dampe finally passes away when you become an adult, and you complete his race to earn the prize.  We also have a chance to earn the heart piece in the windmill upon entering it from the grave.

questions.text: We've just given Cojiro back to his owner in return for an odd mushroom.  Where are we now?
questions.explanation:
Lost Woods.

	Cojiro was a blue chicken we earned from the Cucco lady in Kakariko Village.  We will soon trade the odd mushroom for an odd medicine.  The man we've given Cojiro to is in the adult time, and he's where the skull kid with the flute used to be.

questions.text: We've just bought some Magic Beans in the child era, but where did we just purchase them?
questions.explanation:
Zora's River.

	The magic bean guy is waiting beside a fence near the entrance to Zora's River.  The first bean pod cost only a mere ten rupees.

questions.text: We're fighting flare dancers and freeing Gorons.  Where are we now?
questions.explanation:
Fire Temple.

	Fire Temple is located in Death Mountain Crater.  Darunia asks us to free all of the Gorons, and then we follow him into the boss' lair.

questions.text: We've just earned Nayru's Love!  Where did we collect this awesome spell?
questions.explanation:
Desert Colossus.

	Nayru's Love costs twelve MP to use.  Sadly, it comes very late in the game, otherwise, it'd be very useful at crucial moments.

questions.text: We've just earned the biggest quiver (with the help of Epona)!  Where did we come upon this great prize?
questions.explanation:
Gerudo Fortress.

	We earn the biggest quiver by completing an archery challenge with Epona.  The quiver is won by earning fifteen hundred points.

questions.text: Great Flaming Tektites!  Where could we possibly be if we're fighting Dark Link?
questions.explanation:
Water Temple.

	Upon defeating Dark Link, we can finally collect our longshot.  The longshot is an upgraded hookshot, and is very useful in this game.

questions.text: After so much travelling, let's relax by playing some Bombchu Bowling.  Where are we if we're playing this explosive game?
questions.explanation:
Hyrule Market.

	The game costs thirty rupees, but you can win a bomb bag, bombchus, rupees, and a heart piece!  It's open twenty-four hours a day, and opens for business after completion of Dodongo's Cavern.  You can only play the game as a kid.
